text: Polynema is a genus of fungi in the family Clavicipitaceae. == Species == Polynema asclepiadis - Polynema aurelia - Polynema careyae - Polynema hispidulum - Polynema muirii - Polynema ornatum - Polynema perlaceum - Polynema radiatum - Polynema sinense - Polynema triaristatum - Polynema tricristatum - Polynema vitis == References == == External links == * Category:Hypocreales genera Category:Clavicipitaceae
title: Polynema (fungus)
